trans-unit.source: Allows programmatic access to the HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_link" name="link" href=""></xref> element on the server.
The HtmlLink control allows programmatic access to the HTML `link` element on the server.
The HtmlLink control can be used to programmatically specify a cascading style sheet (CSS) reference in a Web page.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink"></xref> class.
Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink> control.
Gets or sets the URL target of the link specified in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink"></xref> control.
The Href property specifies the URL target of the link specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink> control.
You can use this property to specify the location of an external cascading style sheet (CSS).
The URL target of the link.
Renders the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink"></xref> control to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object.
The Render method renders a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> closing bracket (/>) if the ASP.NET application is configured to render XHTML-compliant markup.
By default, ASP.NET pages and controls render markup that is compatible with the XHTML 1.1 standard.

For more information on configuring an ASP.NET Web site for non-XHTML rendering, see [NIB: How to: Configure XHTML Rendering in ASP.NET Web Sites](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/42483a54-f1ae-44e1-88e6-4370f8690149).
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that receives the rendered content.
Renders the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink"></xref> control's attributes to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object.

The RenderAttributes method resolves the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink.Href%2A> property before calling the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.RenderAttributes%2A> method.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that receives the rendered content.
